item.title: Man dead after skydiving plane crash on NSW south coast
item.description: A group of eight skydivers had successfully landed prior to the crash.

item.title: Brisbane Lions young gun Will Ashcroft wins historic second straight Norm Smith Medal
item.description: ‘Can’t wait to enjoy tonight and next week — and then we get back to work and go again next year.’

item.title: Beiwacht wins Golden Rose for new-look Godolphin
item.description: It’s the first Group 1 win for new-look Godolphin and it came with a track-record time.

item.title: Woman hit by her own car after trying to stop three teens from allegedly stealing her Mercedes in Runaway Bay
item.description: The woman was taken to hospital with critical injuries.

item.title: The Issue with Tim Lester: Albanese’s awkward Trump photo op reveals deeper cracks in Australia–US relations
item.description: Sitting down with The Issue, former Australian Ambassador to Israel Dave Sharma warned the US ‘are sending us a message’ and it’s not a warm one.

item.title: Jeremy Cameron suffers suspected broken arm in AFL grand final: ‘Heard a pretty big snap’
item.description: Shattered family members quickly consoled the Coleman medallist in the rooms.

item.title: Geelong leaders Chris Scott and Patrick Dangerfield praised for sportsmanship after grand final loss to Brisbane
item.description: There were emotional scenes after the bitter loss but both leaders showed a lot of respect.

item.title: Geelong coach Chris Scott questioned over decision to sub out Rhys Stanley over Jeremy Cameron
item.description: Fans were stunned during the grand final with many suggesting the master coach had ‘frozen’.

item.title: Josh Dunkley reveals secret ankle injury requires surgery after winning AFL grand final
item.description: The 28-year-old delayed much-needed surgery to play and is now facing two operations.

item.title: Injured Lions star Jarrod Berry makes personal admission after missing AFL grand final
item.description: ‘I would never be able to forgive myself.’

item.title: The key moments in Brisbane’s epic grand final victory over Geelong
item.description: A struggling star roared backed to life and a roll-the-dice move paid off in spades.

item.title: Teenager dies after being found seriously injured at Morwell in Victoria
item.description: Police also found an injured 20-year-old man nearby.

item.title: Rory McIlroy overcomes challenging day as rowdy fans cause Ryder Cup drama
item.description: ‘People can be their own judge of whether they took it too far or not.’

item.title: Fans take aim at AFL over ‘cringe’ move to mic up Auskick kids for grand final medal presentations
item.description: ‘This seems a little contrived and fake. No need for it.’

item.title: Nick McCallum: Why we have to keeping fighting for justice for the Balibo 5
item.description: In one of the last stories produced by the group, Greg Shackleton painted an Aussie flag to protect him and his fellow journalists. 25 years later, his family is still waiting for justice.

item.title: Thousands gather to honour shark attack victim Mercury Psillakis at Dee Why in Sydney
item.description: Surfers paddled out at the same break where a beloved father was killed while trying to warn other surfers about the shark.

item.title: Brisbane premiership hero Kai Lohmann reveals he lost hearing in his left ear minutes into grand final
item.description: ‘I had heaps of blood in there.’

item.title: Brisbane star Brandon Starcevich faces nervous wait after latest head knock amid free agency call
item.description: The two-time premiership hero has a big decision to make.

item.title: Brisbane co-captain Harris Andrews lifts lid on heated exchange with Bailey Smith during grand final
item.description: The Geelong star’s frustrations boiled over in the dying stages of the grand final.

item.title: Man found dead at shopping centre in Brisbane’s Manly West
item.description: Another man has been arrested and is assisting police with their investigation.

item.title: Brisbane cult hero Oscar McInerney promises to keep shin guard on as players continue premiership celebrations
item.description: The premiership players were all feeling ‘dusty’ as they continued the celebrations.

item.title: Seven’s AFL grand final coverage smashes records to be highest-rated premiership decider since 2016
item.description: The match was the most-watched program of 2025, while streaming numbers on 7plus exploded.

item.title: Frustrated Wallabies coach Joe Schmidt refuses to blame ref for controversial loss to New Zealand
item.description: Australia’s hopes of a rare win in NZ were not helped by 10 penalties in the second half and a dubious yellow card

item.title: Bachelor stars Matty ‘J’ Johnson and Laura Byrne welcome third daughter
item.description: Laura shared the happy news on social media.

item.title: NHL Buffalo Sabres captain Rasmus Dahlin’s fiancée Carolina Matovac suffers heart failure on holiday before undergoing transplant
item.description: ‘It is hard to even think about the worst-case scenario.’

item.title: Boxing superstar Tyson Fury’s daughter Venezuela announces engagement at 16th birthday party
item.description: ‘Me and your dad couldn’t be prouder.’

item.title: Saints pull off greatest comeback in AFLW history to pip Port Adelaide in a thriller
item.description: Jesse Wardlaw was the hero with three goals in the final quarter to inspire the dramatic turnaround.

item.title: Lorenz just admitted to killing his parents on live TV. But he’s pleading not guilty to the charges
item.description: Authorities suspect the 53-year-old killed his elderly parents in 2017 and has been collecting their Social Security benefits.

item.title: Broncos pull off miraculous comeback to end Panthers’ dynasty and book spot in NRL grand final
item.description: A much-loved veteran was the hero with the decisive moment in the dying stages.
